componentInstanceProperties.name: description
componentInstanceProperties.value: TrailheaDX is the must-attend conference of the year for everyone who wants to learn about building on the Salesforce Platform. Get hands-on and learn from Salesforce engineers, product leaders, and the Trailblazer Community. Meet other makers, learn about the latest updates, and blaze your trail.

componentInstanceProperties.name: subheading
componentInstanceProperties.value: Salesforce developer conference dedicated to clicks, code, and people who create
